name: Totally Normal Farming Simulator
description:
Totally Normal Farming Simulator is what it sounds - a totally normal farming simulator. You plant seeds. You water them. You harvest the plants. You smear pentagrams, sacrifice crows, summon a volcano and other seasonal activities.

There is an in-game book that works as an achievement board. See if you can get them all! 😉

Ludum Dare

This game was developed over the course of 72h in LuduDare 52 Jam  mode. The theme of this event was "Harvest".
